summary: This document is an email chain from February 2019 between an Assistant U.S. Attorney (AUSA) from the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and an Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) contact. The AUSA is reaching out to discuss and deconflict the SDNY's ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The document states he is the subject of an ongoing investigation by the Southern District of New York.

events.title: SDNY Investigation Outreach
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney from the SDNY reaches out to an OPR contact to discuss and deconflict the office's ongoing investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The Southern District of New York (SDNY) had an active investigation into Jeffrey Epstein as of February 2019.
An SDNY prosecutor initiated contact with the Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) for case deconfliction.
The communication demonstrates inter-agency coordination regarding the Epstein investigation.
